Judul: HYDROGENATION OF CASTOR OIL FA TT Y RICIN OLEIN FOR PRODUCTION OF LITHIUM 12-HYDROXYSTEARICAS LUBRICANT ENHANCER
Abstrak: ABSTRACT: Castor oil (Ricinus Communis) is one of the most important source for industrial renewable oil. This is largely caused by the high content of ricinoleic acid in its oil glycerides. Further processingof castoroil may produce 12-hydroxystearic acid, which is the most important source for lubricant additive industry. The conversion to its lithium salt, it become a multipurpose additive which increase the properties of grease containing it. The experiment will study the production processes of hydrogenated castor oil and its lithium salt, so that the detail technology can be defined to support development local renewable-base industry.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Peran: Tirto Prakoso  Scan/upload: Dikdik Suhendi (2006-06-12)
